2.PRODUCT_NAME: IBM Lotus Notes to O 365 Migration Tool - Weeom
2.ABOUT:
A robust solution from Weeom Solution to migrate Lotus Notes to Office 365 assures zero impact on data integrity. Weeom Lotus Notes to O365 migration tool reduces the risk and helps them provide a fast and secure migration from Lotus Notes to Office 365. This Lotus Notes migration tool migrates entire NSF emails and other NSF data more than four times faster than other solutions without additional resources. Users can also run the Lotus Notes to Office 365 Migration for multiple mailboxes,.saving users time and increasing scalability during the migration. This software appears to have a user-friendly GUI at all stages of migration. 
 

 Features highlights:
 

 • It has the capability to migrate multiple Lotus Domino Mailboxes at once without any hassles or limitations.
 

 • Once users have added IBM Notes Mailboxes, the software fetches their data, and users can preview them by selecting mailboxes before migration.
 

 • This Lotus Notes migration tool has a folder mapping option using which users can define folder mappings for source mailboxes with the target mailbox.
 

 • According to the destination server, this tool's email translation feature requires while the user wants any changes to the target email address.
 

 • Filter option includes or excludes selective data before the process to migrate Lotus Notes to Office 365 by selected date range.
 

 A free trial: The Weeom Lotus Notes to Office 365 Migration Tool also includes a demonstration module with the migration of the first 50 items per folder, making it convenient for users to evaluate the performance of the full version.

Shoffr's platform is unique as it helps leverage brand's Online Media to drive traffic to their Offline Stores with attribution while providing end to end tracking. Shoffr is GDPR compliant and can be used by brands across any geography. Shoffr’s platform enables the brands to engage with their customers via different online touchposcovery of the product and find the nearest stores with that product in their inventory. An Arrival Code is issued to the customer for the store staff to scan and fetch the correct product at offline stores upon arrival.
 
 Some of the key features of Shoffr include:
 
 Intelligent Store Finder with Live Stock Web Widget for placement on the Brands’s owned Media
 
 Analytics Dashboard offering Insightful Online to Offline Attribution Data
 
 App, Mobile and Web Portal for Store Staff to manage Live Inventory, Stores and Product Catalogues
 
 AI-Enabled Chatbots for Brands to Engage with Customers over Facebook/WhatsApp
 
 Machine Learning & AI Enabled CRM with Custom Audience Segmentation and Profile Enrichment
 
 Shoffr’s proprietary Multilingual, multicurrency Content Management System
 
 Simple, easy to use Online to Offline site/Landing Page builder
 
 
 Shoffr’s was launched in 2017 and in 2019 it's business and platform got acquired by Affle and now complements Affle’s omnichannel platform. Affle started in 2005 and is a global technology company with a proprietary consumer intelligence platform that delivers consumer engagement, acquisitions and transactions through consumer acceptable Mobile Advertising.

5.ABOUT:
Work is changing and the workforce is evolving, forcing organizations to become future-ready today, through personalized reskilling and upskilling programs at a global scale. In addition, COVID crisis has brought a major shift in the world. Employees between 30 and 45 years old have had the greatest increase in resignation rates, +20% in 2021. So, it has become critical for companies to be data-driven to understand their talent and repurpose it for a better role. HCM failed to caughtrowth of innovation in forward-leaning businesses due to disconnected modules and fragmented data sets.
Powered by AI and deep learning, PALM's talent marketplace provides enterprises with a single solution for managing Talent development, retention and upskilling and for growing a diverse global workforce. PALM enables organizations to enrich and unleash the full potential of HR data analytics and turn it into actionable insights in real-time and at a global scale for a winning talent strategy!

In concrete terms, PALM enables to : 
o Provide a collaborative solution for talent
o Identify emerging skills that teams will need very quickly
o Enable the talents within the teams to surround themselves with good profiles, at their level
o Develop employees who are affected by the obsolescence of their skills
o Support performance by supporting and developing teams 
o Have an overview of their talent ecosystem
o Create and maintain links with the various stakeholders in a company's ecosystem, whether they are permanent, temporary or part-time employees, or even former employees or independent experts

PALM provides a unique response to the ongoing revolution of work (rapid obsolescence of skills, generalization of project-based work, increased competition for Talents, etc.), and stands out as an essential tool to prepare the transition to the

ePayco vende es la solución diseñada para todas aquellas personas que desean ir un paso más allá en sus ventas físicas e iniciar la venta de productos por internet, logrando una mayor cobertura y ampliando el alcance del negocio, creando catálogos personalizados con categorías y productos ahorrando tiempo, costos, con pasarela incluida que le permite procesar sus pagos desde el primer momento de creación y publicación del catálogo, seguridad de punta a punta y creación en simpleo 1: Selección del Plan 
 

 En ePayco vende manejamos planes desde cero pesos y los planes pagos oscilan desde $19.900 pesos COL , accediendo a nuestro panel administrativo solo iniciando sesión o si aún no tiene cuenta puede registrase en nuestro sitio web epayco.com en pocos minutos, sin cuotas de mantenimiento o cuota de instalación, darse de alta le permitirá visualizar en el panel izquierdo la solución vende junto al icono del carrito, seleccionar uno de los planes: gratis, plus o ultra, donde sus funcionalidades varían desde las más básicas hasta la más completa herramienta. ¡Acceda ahora mismo sin costo! 
 

 Paso 2: Configuración del catálogo 
 

 La configuración del catálogo se realiza en tres acciones:
 

 • Identidad del catálogo: desde donde podrá definir información importante de su empresa y marca como: nombre, teléfono para contacto a través de whatsapp, subdominio del sitio, y aspectos de personalización como: logo de la empresa, definir un color destacado el cual predominará sobre botones, textos, márgenes entré otros ítems de interacción y cargar hasta tres imágenes tipo banner.
 

 • Creación de categorías: Esta acción le permite facilitar la búsqueda de los productos a los compradores, por eso recomendamos realizar categorías intuitivas y sencillas que permitan la fácil navegación del cliente en el sitio web. 
 

 • Agregue los productos: Por último, Incluya todos los productos definiéndoles un catálogo y categoría, podrá describir el producto de manera detallada, cargar hasta cinco imágenes de los diferentes ángulos del producto, adicionalmente al valor neto podrá realizarle descuentos e incluirle impuestos y por último definir el inventario disponible de productos.

14.ABOUT:
ePayco Suscripciones es la solución que permite el crecimiento de los negocios automatizando cobros, con el respaldo de una plataforma diseñada para garantizar y ofrecer una experiencia renovada en los cobros. Brinda comodidad en el proceso de pago para los clientes, permitiendo realizar cobros y recibir pagos a tiempo, sistematizados y mejorando la retención e ingresos recurrentes de su comercio. ePayco Suscripciones cuenta con alternativas para brindar soluciones rápidas ysus clientes, reduciendo tiempos en el proceso de pago y evitando recordar vencimientos de fechas o recordatorios innecesarios que ya se realizan de manera automática. Con esta solución puede centralizar los pagos y mantenerlos organizados, para generar los cobros automáticos y almacenando los datos de los medios de pago puede controlar y estar al tanto de los movimientos realizados.
 

 ePayco Suscripciones integra soluciones como:
 Tokenización: Le permite almacenar de forma segura los datos de los medios de pago, con la finalidad de agilizar y mejorar la experiencia para usuarios que realizan pagos de forma recurrente, con ventajas como:
 

 • Facilitar y reducir tiempo en el proceso de pago, generando confianza y cercanía con su cliente.
 • La información privada del cliente está almacenada con los más altos estándares de seguridad.
 • Logra destacarse por la experiencia y el servicio ofrecido entre sus competidores.
 

 Recurrencias: Está diseñado para clientes que hacen uso de membresías, planes mensuales, servicios o facturas y para comercios que desean brindar comodidad a su comprador a la hora de realizar el cobro automático de sus productos/servicios, efectuando las deducciones desde el medio de pago permitido por el cliente, ajustadas al periodo solicitado y aceptado por el mismo para generar ese cobro de forma diaria, mensual o anual.
 

 Domiciliación: Ofrece al comercio la opción de conectar dos soluciones de ePayco entre sí, y con domiciliación se puede relacionar facturas y métodos de pago para generar cobros automáticos, así como, generar reglas de cobro para sus facturas e incluir cobros periódicos con montos variables.

By using ElasticWebinar, businesses can streamline their webinar processes and simplify their marketing efforts. The interactive and automated features offered by ElasticWebinar, such as polls, os, chat, and many more can help businesses engage their audience and create a more interactive webinar experience. Ideata dalla PMI innovativa Vesenda, eLegere è la prima piattaforma italiana no-code e low-code di application building per lo Smart Operational Process (SOP) management, che consente una trasformazione digitale sostenibile dei processi operativi aziendali. Flessibile come un foglio di calcolo e solida come un ERP, eLegere permette di creare, configurare e fruire di applicativi web e mobile collaborativi mirati alla raccolta, integrazione, validazione e scambio di dati e informazioaforma offre un unico ambiente collaborativo e integrato in cui gli utenti possono modellare app a bassa (low-code) o nulla (no-code) scrittura di codice in modo semplice e veloce, personalizzandone layout, funzionalità, workflow e security in base alle specifiche esigenze. 
Contrariamente ad altri strumenti Low-Code e No-Code, che obbligano l'utente a partire dal disegno del workflow e del processo, eLegere si concentra sulle esigenze di operatività sul dato, permettendo di disegnare e configurare un'applicazione in modo flessibile.
Disponibile sia on-cloud che on-premise, è conforme a tutti gli standard enterprise di IT, audit e sicurezza. 
La piattaforma è stata adottata con successo da istituzioni e aziende leader di molteplici settori. 
Garantisce qualità e affidabilità nella gestione dei processi, maggiore efficienza, aumento di performance e produttività, ottimizzazione di risorse e riduzione di tempi e costi: un vero attivatore enzimatico della trasformazione digitale sostenibile.

————————————————————————————————
❓ WHAT IS BULKMAIL?
With Gmail™ you can manually send hundreds of emails to different recipients. 
If you need to send a similar email with a variable field or image to many recipients, BulkMail can automate that task. Like. sending Certificate, Greeting, Notification, Update, Results etc
You write your message, as usual, in a Gmail™ draft,  add the list of recipients in sheet and BulkMail will send your message to all of them.

————————————————————————————————
🤔 Why use BulkMail and not others?
BulkMail is using only google sheet based function for all tasks, No any external API or other thing. It is a pure Google Sheet based add-on with Full Customization, Security, Flexibility, Transparency and Privacy.


👇 Read more about pricing, quota, features, support,.

————————————————————————————————
🎯 6-STEPS TUTORIAL:
After Installation Go to Sheet and from Add-ons menu Go To BulkMail and Click refresh. It is required to enable BulkMail for that sheet. 

1️⃣ Prepare Design
Option-1: Create a new draft in Gmail™
Option-2: Use Design of Received Email
Option-3: Write HTML code
optionally add merge fields like {First Name} for the merge field to personalize your email. You can also use {Image} to place a variable image for each email from Google Drive.
👉 Then Open Sheet Go to BulkMail> Configure and go to 1st option. Choose suitable option and click save to save HTML code in sheet
2️⃣ Select Design (HTML): Select Design which you saved in the sheet in the 1st step which will be used for email sending.
3️⃣ (Optional) You can Send Test email to yourself for any row
4️⃣ (Optional) Set Email Tracking ,
5️⃣ (Optional) Unsubcribe setting,

6️⃣ Click Run: BulkMail will automatically send your message to each recipient and track your email campaign (opens, unsubscribes etc)

————————————————————————————————
🔒SECURITY/Privacy
BulkMail is completely running on Google. 100% data will remain in Google Sheets. No data will be shared outside Google. Your list of recipients stays in your spreadsheets, your email content stays in Gmail™.

————————————————————————————————
🆘 Support 
Email us admin@clinchscript.com and our team will get back to you shortly!
Or visit our help center: https://www.clinchscript.com/bulk-mail/faq-solutions

————————————————————————————————

And whatnot ❓


————————————————————————————————

•	Send Personalized Emails from Gmail with Google Sheet
•	Unique Subject, Unique multiple attachment, Unique Admin Name, Unique Message, Unique Inline Variable image with resize option, Unique To email ids, Unique CC email ids, Unique BCC email ids, Unique Reply to email ids etc.. All this for each email id.

Note: Due to a recent update in Policy. Try to skip adding sender name and reply To email addresses while using BulkMail. (or any other mail merge tool). Leave those columns blank Otherwise your email may go to spam or not deliver.
•	And Many more

➤ BulkMail works with Gmail and GSuite accounts. You can send merged emails immediately or use the built-in scheduler and send emails at a later date and time.

17.ABOUT:
Summary and Relevance for Covid-19 Desk Sharing is a solution for desk reservations. It has become more and more relevant during the Covid-19 pandemic with its regulations like safety distances. Office administrators can comply with latest policies by increasing or decreasing the number of available desks. Some companies expanded during the pandemic, hiring home office workers. The new workers didn’t get a dedicated desk and there is simply not enough space for everybody. Plus, eve “Home office is here to stay”. Why bother about creating more office space? Just make sure to avoid overbooking on popular days and monitor desk utilization.
Another case for many companies around the globe is: 2020-2021 did not go as planned. If you need to downsize the office space due to cost reduction, desk sharing is the perfect solution to support hybrid work.
With the Desk Sharing solution, users easily see available desks in real time on the browser or via dedicated displays on site. The booking covers the walk-in situation for the next hours and supports those users who like to plan the next weeks from home. The latter can do convenient multi-bookings for the days they’re planning to visit the office.
The solution can be deployed based on programs like O635, Microsoft Exchange or Google Workspace (formerly GSuite). But it’s capable of running without calendar integrations.


Functionality


The main view gives a visual orientation on the floor plan including custom orientation objects like doors, walls, copy machines. This view shows red and green elements, giving the reservation status of desks or workstations.
On each floor, customers can choose to operate big overview displays or tablets. All users can access the floor plans also on their PCs/smartphones. Users are in the situation of asking “Which desk is free for how many hours?” or “Where is the desk I booked yesterday?”. In a walk-in booking, users can check for availability based on time slots or check the layout plan. This is a visual search for free space. Another use case supported here is: “26 of 40 desks are free but I want to sit close to my team leader whom I can see over there”. The booking is done by pressing on the desk.
The booking for future days usually works in a way that users specify the location and day. The free tables can be recognized by their green coloring. Through additional color coding, it is apparent whether a desk is occupied for the full day, booked only for the morning or for the afternoon. The bookings of the colleagues are listed with their names. Select and confirm - done. If there are special requirements for the workplace, these can be called up via additional information (e.g. two monitors or specific equipment). Pictures can also be stored. Accepted reservations are confirmed by email and include links to import calendar entries for Outlook, Google calendar or other client programs.


Advanced Upgrade Options


If one has arrived at the last meters, there are further concepts to support wayfinding or to display the status. Optional mini-displays showing the booking status on each desk - similar to a digital meeting room door sign. Some customers prefer to have one tablet display for a group of desks inside the open office. To save hardware costs for tablets, android boxes could be implemented as well. Those are connected to the existing monitors as a 2nd HDMI input source. Another option is to integrate 3rd party standalone programmable LEDs to give visibility from distance. Depending on the customer’s requirements, occupancy can be processed using sensors. The solution can be deployed within a day. In big office environments with hundreds of desks it needs a project approach to satisfy individual requirements like advanced integrations.

Sheet Director supports 45+ apps across various categories. KEY FEATURES ► Manage Services - manage multiple services from single Google Sheet connecting to several Apps. These services can be listed, edited, executed and deleted. ► Connect with Apps through various authenhanisms (key, oAuth1, oAuth2, etc).

►  Bi directional data flow - Query (pull) and Post (push) service types

► Choose or create the destination sheet and start cell 

►  Prepare and Post data from Google Sheets into Apps

► Conditional Posting - Post your records to Apps when it meets your own custom conditions

►  Manual and automatic (scheduled) execution of services -  Set monthly, weekly, daily, or hourly refreshes and automate your services.

► Success notification with a templated email message

► Error notification is sent when there is a failure in processing the configured services.

► Execution Logs to monitor automated executions



Automate your day-to-day reporting with awesome dashboard, visualizations from cross-platform/app data mashups.

Sheet Director is a great API Connector/ Integrator and the best alternative/ complementary to Zapier, Supermetrics, Automate.io, Workato, SheetsGo, JSON Importer, etc.


APPLICATIONS AND SERVICES

Below are the applications supported along with services offered. Remember that there is no limit to your creativity to use Sheet Director wherever you feel it fits and whatever use cases that you may have.


֍ G Suite Apps to Google Sheets:

► Google Sheets
➥ Distribute - Segment data from a source sheet and send that data across 'n' number of sheets based on configuration.
➥ Backup - Take back up of Google Sheets by cloning/ copying into the preset folder.

►  Email
➥ Send Email - Send contents from a Google Sheet as PDF and Inline table to the client via Email.
➥ Mail Merge - Send emails by merging data from Google Sheets with a templated email message


► Google Drive to Google Sheets
➥ List File -Select a folder from google drive and list all files in it inside a Google sheet.

► Google Calendar to Google Sheets 
➥ Get Events - Query and pull calendar events from Google Calendar  into Google Sheets.
➥ Post Events - Post Google Sheet data into calendar to create Calendar events.


► Google Tasks to Google Sheets
➥ Get Tasks - Pull all tasks from Google Tasks and present it in Google Sheets.
➥ Post Tasks - Post data from Google Sheets to Google Tasks

► Google Contacts to Google Sheets
➥ Get Contacts - Pull all contacts from Google contacts into Google Sheets.
➥ Post Contacts - Push data from Google Sheets into Google Contacts.

► Google Classroom to Google Sheets
➥ Query - Query all contents from Google Classroom and present it in Google Sheet.

► Google Admin to Google Sheets
➥ Query - Query all contents from Google Admin and present it in Google Sheets.

► Google Analytics to Google Sheets
➥ Query - Query all contents from Google Analytics and present it in Google Sheets.
